text_block_list.text:
Finally the day of the Selection race had come. 
Rhein Kraft had been getting stronger quite quickly, 
and her current condition seemed really good too.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much! 
Thanks to Trainer-san, I'm fully prepared.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
……But, I can't let my guard down. 
Because――!

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
Refuse to lose! Alright, let's get started. 
I'll show you what the future queen will look like!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Preparations complete. All that's left is to show the results……! 
――Please watch closely, mother.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
……I won't let you take it. I'll prove that I am suitable 
to lead……The one that will take the Tiara, will be me――!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Just like me……they're seriously aiming to stand on the 
Tiara stage. Those girls all strongly desire to shine there.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
All of them are definitely strong. My rivals for today. 
……But, that's exactly why――!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I'll show them that I'm number 1! 
I'll prove that I'll be a future Triple Tiara Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Yeah!!
And finally, the curtain rose on their Selection Race――!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
It's a fierce battle for the lead! Rhein Kraft and Daring 
Heart both take a good position in the leading group!

text_block_list.name: Kraft & Heart
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa, haa……!!

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
Whoa……I-isn't this kind of high level? 
This isn't something you'd normally see in a selection race……!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: ……! Rhein Kraft-san――

For girls that hadn't even debuted, this race was more 
intense than expected. Before they realized it, 
everyone, including the reporters, couldn't look away.
And so the end of the race approached……!!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Right here……! 
Haaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: I won't let you!! Yaaaaaaaaaaaーーー!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
From the back, Cesario and Air Messiah move in to the spurt!! 
With 400m left, they push through to close the distance!!

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
Not yet! I can't just give it to you……! 
Aaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(Aaah! I can feel it! Heart-san, Messiah-san, 
Cesario……everyone's feelings are clashing……!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(That's right, after all, we're strong. The Uma Musume 
competing for the Tiara are also definitely strong!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (However――that's why!!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaーーーーー!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(But among them, it's me!! I'm the strongest!! 
I'll show them I can be――!!)

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
With 200m left, Rhein Kraft won't let them take the lead! Cesario 
is hanging on! Daring Heart and Air Messiah are right behind!

text_block_list.name: Rivals
text_block_list.text: 『I will!』『I will!』『I will!』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: I will――!!

text_block_list.name: All 4
text_block_list.text: 『I will wiiiiiiiiiiinーーー!!』
(Whooooooooaaaaaa!!)

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
What a cheer……! Hey, hey, this generation's 
pretty crazy! To think we'd see something like 
this from girls that haven't even debuted yet……!!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah. Yeah, truly――

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
Just like you promised, we saw it……it reached us, Kraft-san. The 
expectations for the future Tiara rotation……are certainly high!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa, haaa…… 
Hafuu～～～……!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Trainer-san……!! 
Ehehe, so you came.

Unexpectedly, the words that came out of my mouth 
were quite normal. I was a little disappointed in 
myself. But she……she really did something amazing.

She didn't only improve her own running. 
That feeling was spread around to her rivals too――

It meant she could show her strength during a more 
intense race……the kind that moved people's hearts.
choice_data_list: You really……are an amazing Uma Musume. So――
You really……are an amazing Uma Musume. So――

text_block_list.text:
……Honestly, she was so exceptional in terms of both 
talent and ambition, that I couldn't help but think 
someone other than a rookie like me should be her trainer.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! Please become my trainer! 
I'm looking forward to it!!

Just as I was about to speak my mind, I was met 
with something unexpected. I couldn't help but 
stand there, dumbfounded. While I did that――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
After all……didn't you say that you could 
already see my dream? Didn't you say that?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
And that you really love the Tiara route. 
And that we could prove we were strong too.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Once I've made a decision, I'm the type to 
stubbornly stick to it, you know. ――That's why!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I want you to be my trainer. This is also something 
I won't give up on. That I don't want to give up on!

I couldn't help but be drawn in to her straight-forward eyes. 
If she was going to say that much, then I made my decision.
choice_data_list: From now on, I'm looking forward to it!
From now on, I'm looking forward to it!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! 
Let's get the Triple Tiara together!
